---
name: Protype bug report
about: Regular issues in ALPHA testing
title: "[ALPHA] [<version>] <brief description>"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

* Always specify the release version under which the issue was detected.
* Always attach the log file for that testing session. Ensure that game setting "Verbose logging" is enabled.
* Attach screenshots and videos when possible.
* Be specific in the description. Specify which parts you were paying with.
